Projects 

About Me 
I am a responsible and a dedicated 

undergraduate who seeks to engage in 

new opportunities with fresh ideas 

while enjoying what I do. I strive to 

achieve success in my work with the 

discipline of hard working through 

intelligent efforts and logical thinking. 

I believe that with the right motivation 

and passion anything can be achieved. 

Rahunath Yoganathan 
Software Engineer 

Personal Information 

Address: No-111BA, Maharambaikkulam, 
Vavuniya 

Email: rahunath.rotti@gmail.com 

LinkedIn: Yoganathan Rahunath 

Phone: +94775485842 

 

Technical Skills 

Programming languages: 

Java, Python, C. 

Web Development: 

HTML, CSS, PHP, Boot strap, 
JavaScript. 

Database: 

MySQL, Firebase. 

Others: 

NLP, Machine Learning, Laravel, Git. 

The Pulz Technologies: Trainee Software Engineer 

AI Based Tele avatar for Banks (ATM)  

Period: Sep 2017 – Feb 2018 

Domain: Develop a chatbot for Banking domain using NLP. 

Description: Main system was a digital avatar build using image 

processing where user can interact with the system by speech. According 

to the system my task was to develop a chatbot system for banking 

domain (ATM FAQs). Send the user question as an input and extract 

details from the text input using NLTK (Python library) and recognize the 

user intent and return relevant response. Machine learning was used to 

find the pattern matching to select the suitable response for the relevant 

question.  

Tools and Technologies: Python, NLTK, FLASK, C# (WPF) 

University Projects 

Strategic Marketing and Deep analysis using NLP   

Final year project and my task was to develop a real time chatbot model 

to provide customer support for cosmetic products for a limited domain. 

I used NLTK to extract details from the user question and Machine 

learning to predict the response using extracted details.   

Tools and Technologies: Python, NLTK, Machine learning (Naïve-Bayes) 

 

Educational Organizational Management System   

The online web system to carry out educational and management 

activities of an educational organization where users can login to the 

system and involve in educational activities and android application to 

keep users updated with the system. 

Tools and Technologies – Laravel (PHP framework), Firebase technology 

JavaScript, MySQL, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS.  

Automated Milk Toffee Maker  

It is an automated machine which is designed to produce milk toffee in a 

standard quality and with taste for house scale purpose. 

 Tools and Technologies – Microcontrollers (Atmega32A), C, Motors 

and controller and Keypad module. 

 

https://www.linkedin.com/in/rahunath-yoganathan-b733a7b4/

Extra-curricular Activities

ABOUT 
 

A dedicated, self-motivated and hardworking undergraduate who is willing to learn 
and adapt to new technologies. I am a fast learner and capable at both working 
individually or as a team. I seek a challenging opportunity to bring value to the 
organization and to improve my skills and knowledge as a Software Quality 
Assurance Engineer. 
 

 
 

WORK EXPERIENCE 
 

QUALITY ASSURANCE ENGINEER - INTERN 

SimCentric Technologies | August 2018 – February 2019 (06 months) 

Successfully completed the internship by testing the project, VSALT (Visual 
Search and Autonomous Linkage Tool) that facilitates a cohesion of Human 
Interaction and Autonomous Data Processing for Human Intelligence to improve 
Big Data Analysis and Reporting. 

 
Responsibilities: Test case design, Test execution (Smoke, Functional, 
Regression Testing etc.), Test the server and installer of VSALT application, 
Defect tracking & management in JIRA, JIRA issue creation for bugs and 
improvements with descriptive information, Update Squash Test Management, 
Presenting in daily standup meetings/ QA demonstrations, Agile/ Scrum 
Processes 
 

 
 

EDUCATION 
 
UNIVERSITY OF MORATUWA (2015- Present) GPA- 3.75 up to Level 3  

BSc. (Hons.) in Information Technology and Management (Level 4) 

(Core Subjects: IT Quality Assurance, IT Project Management, Human Computer 
Interaction, Data Structures and Algorithms, Multimedia and Web Technologies) 

 

PANADURA BALIKA MAHA VIDYALAYA 

 G.C.E Advanced Level (2014)- Commerce Stream 

Results: ICT - A, Economics - A, Accounting - A (Z Score: 2.0655) 
 

 G.C.E. Ordinary Level (2011) 

Results: 8As and B 
 

 

PROFESSIONAL QUALIFICATION

Automation Frameworks” at University of Colombo School of Computing 
(UCSC)

Park, 752/5, Dr. Danister De Silva 
Mawatha, Colombo 09. 

Mobile: (+94) 77 7866 149 

Email: k.prasha02@gmail.com 

 

 
 

 

ENGLISH TO SINHALA BRAILLE CONVERTER AND GRAMMAR CHECKER (Level 4 
Research- Ongoing) 

A system which converts English document to Sinhala document, provide Sinhala 
grammar checking for the converted text, convert Sinhala text into Sinhala braille 
language and convert Sinhala braille image into corresponding Sinhala text. 

Technologies: NLP, Image Processing Techniques, Java, Python, C++ 
 

IMPROVING SOFTWARE QUALITY ASSURANCE IN DEVELOPING COUNTRIES (Level 3 
Independent Study) 
Research on importance of Software Quality Assurance and ways to improve 

software quality in developing countries. CMMI, Process and Product Quality 

Assurance, Basic quality models, Reasons for reducing software quality in 

organizations, Ways of improving software quality and benefits of software 

quality are discussed in the study.  
 

MEMBERSHIP PLATFORM (Level 2 Software Project) 
Mentored by Maya Creations (PVT) Ltd. A system to provide a technical 

platform to university students to be exposed to the professional world. 

Technologies: PHP, JavaScript, HTML 5, Bootstrap, MySQL 
 

AUTOMATED BABY STROLLER (Level 1 Hardware Project) 

A baby stroller which can follow the directions of adult without any physical 

contact with the adult. The baby stroller is controlled by using a device and 

mobile application 

Technologies: Microcontroller ATmega 32A, Ultrasonic Sensor, Mercury Switch 
 
 

 

ACHIEVEMENTS 
 
 Published a thesis for Diploma in English (NIBM) under the topic of “A Study 

on Why the Advanced Level Students Lack English Knowledge: with special 
reference to three schools in Kalutara District”. 
 

 Won University Grants Commission (UGC) approved foreign scholarship 
which is given by Higher Education Ministry of Sri Lanka and University Grants 
Commission of India for Sri Lankan students who were selected to the 
universities in Sri Lanka in 2015 

 

 Won prizes for the highest proficiency level for years of 2006, 2008, 2009, 
2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014 at Panadura Balika Maha Vidyalaya. 

 

 Won Merit- Bronze Medal for Verse Speaking of Sri Lanka Festival of Music, 
Dance and Speech for the year of 2003. 

 

 Won Merit- Gold Medal for Verse Speaking of British Federation of Festivals 
for Music, Dance and Speech U.K. in Sri Lanka in 2002. 

 

 Participated for Spoken English Festivals of Colombo Academy of Language 
Skills & Dramatic Art in 2001, 2002. 

 
 

 

EXTRA CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES 
 

Writer of “fit2school” Website 
 

Group Leader of second year industry based project 
 

Active member of Commerce Society, Panadura Balika Maha Vidyalaya

MODEL TO IDENTIFY DRIVER'S DROWSINESS
